posts.post_content: Back in the days of Revised, I saved up my money (since I was still in high school) and bought a couple of booster packs. I dreamed of geting Shivan Dragons and Forces of Nature... and, instead, in the span of 2 weeks I got 2 Animate Walls. I was not happy, and I still don't like this card to this day.

"Animate Wall wasn't bad with Illusionary Wall."

when we just forget about Wall of Swords and the pumpable walls for a second :P)
